channel.title: How do i make emote tabs teleport you when you click on them
channel.description:
Could some one please tell me how to make in my emote tabs when you click on them teleport you to places and how do i change the name of the emote. I'd appreciate it.
crip 4 lyfe

item.title: How do i make emote tabs teleport you when you click on them
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

1st serach for update() and if ya wanan do bank put after the ; hit entersendFrame126("@red@Bank", 180);//frist emote slot its uslally always sendFrame126 and put 2nd code in
|
|

emote? well find the case of the emote eg if u want bank in emote find case 168 and put this code:

case 168:// bank emote if(emotes == 0) { if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy."); } else { openUpBank(); } } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
